name: Cubescape (Rui Castello)
description:
“Cubescape” 

A minimalist survival racing  game

Introduction

Cubescape is a game where your reflexes and agility will be tested through a trial by fire. It’s a short game, with a duration of approximately 3 minutes where there’s no room for second chances, if you lose, you start again.

Number of players: 1

Game time: 3 minutes (max.)

Objective: The objective of this game is to survive for as long as you can without colliding with any obstacle. The player wins if he can survive for around 3 minutes.

Game Guide

Movement and Actions

  • The player moves using the cursor keys in its four directions: up, down, left, and right.
  • After gaining the Purple Cube Power-Up, the player will be able to use the “space” key to shoot one single bullet.

Obstacles

  • Obstacles increase in number as time goes on.
  • If the player collides with any obstacle, the game restarts.

Power-Ups

  • Power Ups spawn sporadically on the same lanes as the obstacles but move much faster. 

Instead of trying to avoid them, the player should try to collide with them to activate their effects. 

There’s two types of Power-Ups:

  • Purple Cube - Shoots 2 bullets at the moment of impact and provides the player with a bullet. This bullet can be shot at any moment by pressing the “Space” key.
  • Yellow Cube - Shoots several bullets in different directions at the moment of impact.
